genresAdvancedInfo.name: finnish metalcore
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Finnish metalcore is a subgenre of metal that blends elements of hardcore punk and metal. Bands like Mokoma and Medeia are known for their aggressive sound, use of breakdowns, and incorporation of melodic elements. Finnish metalcore often features politically charged lyrics and a DIY ethos, reflecting the punk roots of the genre.
